ValidationRule.description: Checking for blank PSC account. Otherwise throws trigger error.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISBLANK(Project_Site_Contact_Account__c) || ISBLANK(Project_Site_Contact_Name__c)) && year(DATEVALUE( Date_Time_Taken__c )) = year(today()) && And(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Division__c , 'Marketing')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Division__c , 'Consulting')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Division__c , 'Technical Svces')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Project Site Contact or Account cannot be blank.
